question: You are having a graduation party next Sunday evening. You have invited over 25 people to celebrate in your garden, which may continue late into the night.Write a letter to the Chairman of the Housing Society. In your letter:·        Explain what will be happening·        Offer your apologies in advance·        Invite him to join the celebration
text: I'm writing to extend an invitation to you to my graduation party on Sunday.

I completed my bachelor's degree with the top grade in my class, and to commemorate my achievement, I will organize a private party in my backyard with my peers. The festivities will begin at 7:00 p.m. and will last until midnight, as there are numerous activities planned, including games, dancing, speeches, and food.

Because this is a special party with more than twenty-five college students, there may be some noise, so please accept my apologies ahead of time. To avoid causing too much noise, I'll make sure to keep the music volume low. In addition, I will remind everyone not to toss trash on the streets in order to keep our surroundings clean.

You've always encouraged me to pursue my objectives, and it's thanks to your abundant blessings that I was able to accomplish my goal. It would be fantastic if you could attend this meeting to make it more interesting and to contribute a few words about life that might motivate my friends to achieve their goals. I hope to see you next weekend at the event.

error_list.error_des: If you do not want Nithisha to be marked as misspelled in the future, you can add it to your personal dictionary.
